summary: While at an amusement park, two men try to win the heart of a young lady. They compete with each other while attempting to find her runaway dog, and they race to ask her mother's permission to take her up in a hot air balloon.
cast: Harold Lloyd|Mildred Davis|Roy Brooks|Sammy Brooks|William Gillespie|Wallace Howe|Mark Jones|Gaylord Lloyd|Ernest Morrison|Hal Roach|Charles Stevenson
director: Directors: Hal Roach, Fred C. Newmeyer (co-director) (as Fred Newmeyer)
title: Number, Please?
